column1: Powered goods vehicles by country of registration1, 1990 - 2011
1  Comparison of the quarterly figures by country should be treated with caution.
3  Prior to 1995, relates to EU12 (Austria, Sweden and Finland did not join until 1995).

(b) Romania and Bulgaria included in 2004, 2005 and 2006 as they did not join the EU until 2007
6  Figures for one operator have been estimated in Q3 2011.
